sec.title: Information for emergency situations
sec.p: Information shall be included to instruct the operator on how to handle an emergency situation:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: how the emergency stops and trip devices according to 4.4.3 are installed and function;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: the location and use of fire extinguishers or fire extinguish systems;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: instructions of when and how to use safety harness or escape/recovery equipment.
